mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_org( id, parent_id, parent_ids, code, name, sort, type, level, address, master, phone, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{level}, #{address}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{createBy.id}, #{createAt}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateAt}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
